name: 69 Ways To Get A Job In Advertising
description:
So, you’ve decided you want a job working in the creative department of an ad agency. Good choice. Creating ads can be interesting, rewarding and a lot of fun. 

However, landing your first job as an art director or copywriter can be a difficult task. That’s because you’re probably not sure what kind of work to put in your portfolio, who you should be listening to, or even what potential employers are looking for. 

While there are plenty of books available on the subject of how to create great ads, there are very few that offer advice on how to get a job creating them.

But that’s where this book comes in. By offering you a range of useful tips, it aims to set you on the path to finding that elusive first job.
